name: Monk
blurb: Mystics and martial artists who have honed their bodies into living weapons.
writeup: Every monk that joins an adventuring party has a story about why they are not back at the monastery. Some chase a vision, while others have been driven out. For some, it’s a temporary step in their training. For others, it’s a permanent exile. And for a very few, a hard-won escape.
backgrounds: holy acolyte, mountain sanctuary guardsman, traveling circus acrobat, river guide, spider-cult assassin, tunnel vermin exterminator, bodyguard, farmer, hallucinogenic mushroom farmer, wild mountain ginseng harvester, traveling tournament organizer, civil rights organizer.
